strings.affinity:
We're not done fighting just yet,
but have you given thought to the future?
strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Eight was taken in at an early age, and has since been raised as a cadet to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors, as a member of Akademeia's Class Zero. Although short in stature, he uses his own fists as weapons in battle. He also boasts of a knack for sound judgment and keen perception of his surroundings. Such skills can prove very valuable in infiltrations whilst posing as a prisoner of war, leading the mission toward success.
strings.fusion:
Regardless the situation,
you must never neglect your training.
strings.summon:
The crystals are dangerous?
We can't simply look past this.
I will help you as well.

strings.evolution: We must try not to forget those who lost their lives while we still remain.
strings.affinity:
We're not done fighting just yet,
but have you given thought to the future?
strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Eight is one of the members of Class Zero, who are all Agito Cadets. Calm and collected, he never allows his emotions to impair his sound judgment. At times his straightforwardness makes him appear like the oddball of Class Zero, but it is this particular quality that leaves him with the responsibility of calming other more hotheaded cadets. Eight displays his quick wit best on the battlefield when landing blow after blow to close in on his enemies, every one of his punches carrying his full might.
strings.fusion: My fists shall at least remember the pain that you feel...
strings.summon:
One should always follow orders.
That way the result is always the same.

strings.evolution:
This isn't the time for celebrating.
You must always remain on guard.
strings.affinity:
We're not done fighting just yet,
but have you given thought to the future?
strings.description: A young man who appears in the tales of a world divided into four nations that individually control their own unique Crystals. Eight is a cadet training with Class Zero to become Agito, the legendary savior or saviors, by undertaking missions given by the Akademeia. He chooses to fight with his own fists instead of weapons in order to remember the pain he inflicts on his enemies, as well as the pain he feels when striking them. Quick-witted and agile, he uses a combination of punches and kicks, as well as battle stances to face his enemies.
strings.fusion:
My fists are my weapons.
I never want to forget the agony of inflicting pain.
strings.summon:
We don't have so many options.
I will carry out the mission as planned.
